title: Looking for a Competitive Team - Diamond 4 Support
body:
**IGN:** Ix Sonic x
**Age:** 25
**Role:** Support
**Rank:** Diamond 4
**Current Availability:** 7 Days a week - 5 Nights a week.

**Main Champions:** {{champion:267}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:89}} Can play most supports though.

replies.body:
Was my previous support, is a very good player and a strong support. Is able to shot call efficiently and can take constructive criticism, is a great addition to any team and I recommend you pick him up before someone else does.

Best of luck Sonic
